game.name: Sporbs
game.shortDescription: A relaxing, short incremental game where you harvest Orbs from newly discovered alien organisms. Upgrade your extraction technology, manage resources, and unlock new areas to maximise your yield.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A relaxing, short incremental game where you harvest Orbs from newly discovered alien organisms. Upgrade your extraction technology, manage resources, and unlock new areas to maximise your yield.
